content.question: The figure shows a single resistor as well as three collections of resistors. Every resistor in the figure has the same resistance <math alttext="R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and the equivalent resistances <math alttext="R sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="R sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="R sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></msub></math> of collections <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="R sub X is greater than R sub Y, which is greater than R sub 0, which is greater than R sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R sub Y is greater than R sub X, which is greater than R sub 0, which is greater than R sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R sub Z is greater than R sub X, which is greater than R sub Y, which is greater than R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R sub Z is greater than R sub Y, which is greater than R sub X, which is greater than R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="R sub X is greater than R sub Y, which is greater than R sub 0, which is greater than R sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
